entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • consider pulling long running threatpool threads from the pool #105165
    10.0.0
  • JIT: SVE - Added first-faulting behavior testing for NonFaulting APIs #105163
    9.0.0
  • Add back ILLink usage of dependency analysis framework #105159
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose JsonPropertyInfo.MemberName #105155
  • Possible unobserved IOException in HttpClient using SocketsHttpHandler #105154
  • [Apple][TVOS] Unhandled exception. System.IO.IOException: No space left on device #105146
  • Should `System.Int64.GetHashCode()` avoid dereferencing `m_value` twice? #105142
    9.0.0
  • Poor project evaluation performance for project at least under src/libraries #105139
    10.0.0
  • No-op build spends an unreasonable amount of time in the ChooseBestTargetFrameworksTask task #105138
    10.0.0
  • `LibraryImportGenerator` fails when `LibraryImportAttribute` is aliased #105137
  • nativeaot\\SmokeTests\\Reflection\\Reflection\\Reflection.cmd fails with Access Violation #105136
  • [wasm] Review relink triggering properties #105135
    10.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] Fail to launch grandnode with error "Some services are not able to be constructed" #105134
    9.0.0
  • Unmanaged memory growth with DiagnosticsClient #105132
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Clean-up internal testing related to hybrid globalization #105130
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.sh #105125
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Transactions.Tests.TransactionManagerTest.DefaultTimeout_MaxTimeout_Set_Get #105124
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Profiling problem on armv7l #105070
    9.0.0
  • XPS documents in .NET Core can't be opened #51929
    Future
  • File uploader crashes app on iOS when "use device camera" is used instead of "photo library". #94698
  • Cryptographic cryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock() Throws Exception "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" when data is passed in chunks #103470
  • Scoped ServiceProvider not releasing disposing HttpClient #96296
    Future
  • Test `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` stack overflowing in Windows x64 release for `libraries-pgo` pipeline #100246
    9.0.0
  • [mono][android] Failures in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildChainForSelfSignedCertificate_* #100224
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Security tests are failing #68206
    Future
  • Make Type.IsGenericType and GetGenericTypeDefinition() JIT intrinsics (and JIT time constants) #96898
    9.0.0
  • Need information about KB5039889 and SHA256 unsafe thread usage #105013
  • JIT: Add support for strength reduction #100913
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] [Linux] Segmentation fault in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103703
    9.0.0
  • CI error: System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #91757
    9.0.0
  • `ExposedLocalsNumbering` runtime test disabled #80184
    9.0.0
  • JIT: mcs dumpMap broken on at least one recent collection #104482
    Future
  • SIGSEGV in msquic on Linux ARM32 #103404
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support await'ing a Task<T> without throwing #97556
  • Remove Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange generic constraint #65184
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 8/25/2023 8:20:08 PM #91280
  • One about foreach and type access #80647
  • [API Proposal]: Ascii.ToUtf16 overload that treats `\0` as invalid #80366
  • CI test failures in GenerateRuntimeGraphTests on tvOS simulator and iOS simulator. #77889
    10.0.0
  • Optimize unboxing for nullable #104954
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Make X509Certificate2Collection (and X509CertificateCollection) thread-safe #100613
  • [6.0] CryptographicException : Cryptography_OAEPDecoding in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaDecryptAfterExport #99792
  • Android SslStream splits messages over 2048 bytes in multiple TLS records (breaks MS-TDS protocol) #95295
    9.0.0
  • Failure to Load libcrypto.so.1.1 and libssl.so.1.1 While Using Hikvision SDK #99455
  • [outerloop] System.Runtime.Numerics BigInteger assert failure #98966
  • Unable to use Process.Start() in Mac Catalyst Universal application in Release configuration #100129
  • JIT: `StaysWithinManagedObject` should be able to handle more cloned loops patterns #105087
    9.0.0
  • "error MSB1008: Es darf nur ein Projekt angegeben werden" while trying to compile .net 8.0.7 #105067
  • Windows build break because of System.Security.Cryptography #105126
  • Nuget Update for CVE-2024-0057 #96981
  • [API Proposal]: IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.Smoothstep #94091
  • Request for analyser ICU usage and/or TZ data #100531
  • Complex.ToString format changed from (a, b) to <a; b> #93454

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: Switch `StaysWithinManagedObject` to peel offsets from VNs #105169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix method numbering in Memory-model.md example code #105168
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove now-redundant Debug.Assert messages #105167
    needs-area-label
  • [WIP] Disallow gen1 - code by @maoni0 as a PR with the Fragmentation Fix Changes #105166
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixed for assertion failure due to not checking if we are processing Ephemeral Samples in calculate_new_heap_count #105164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Draft] JIT: Testing field-wise analysis #105162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable inversion of top-tested loops #105161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.IO.Packaging test trim safe #105160
    area-System.IO
  • Remove unused members on runtime Thread #105158
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][NO REVIEW] Testing new alpine image with Helix and libraries tests #105157
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Emit marhsalling exception when dealing with MONO_MARSHAL_CONV_OBJECT_IUNKNOWN #105156
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105153
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] Introducing Environment.CpuUsage #105152
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add a thread pool config var on Windows for choosing the number of IOCPs #105145
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [browser][publish] Unicode in the path are parsed correctly in Windows for AOT/relink by emcc #105144
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions #105143
    area-Meta
  • Fix clang19 build #105141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Ignore] Test change #105133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Calculate version range in init-compiler.sh script #105129
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code related to intercept stubs #105127
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105104
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable AVX for Sve leg #105113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • JIT: Improve and fix `StaysWithinManagedObject` #105108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific active issues in System.Net.Security and System.Security.Cryptography #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of SIMD comparisons #104944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable strength reduction by default #105131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Ubuntu wasm-related versions -- release/8.0-staging #105062
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetUsefulGlobals #105106
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert `GetMethodFromStackTrace` to QCall #105103
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix the ExposedLocalsNumbering test #105037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes from API review approvals #104990
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable QUIC & HTTP/3 tests for ARM #105109
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions #105121
    area-Meta
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback on DiagnosticId changes #105096
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Apply IDE0300 to corelib (use collection expressions instead of new[]) #105122
    area-Meta
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Implement GetObjectStringData #105061
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions" #105128
    area-Meta
  • Expand unboxing for Nullable<> in JIT #105073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #104443
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Move telemetry out of lock scope #105140
    area-System.Net
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Add a pass to remove unused primary IVs #105107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    GCStress, area-GC-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2498541 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NO MERGE] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Don't do aggressive block compaction too early #105041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix warning for MakeGenericType annotation mismatch #104921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Set default for disableIntegrityCheck to true #102515
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [llvm 19][mini] print some info if we're about to assert that plt_entry == NULL #105112
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [WASM] Update features doc #105068
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • handle Unicode encoding in Console.Beep #105094
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty - Get spawned thread by ID from Process.Threads to avoid mismatch #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #104728
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `in` on `Unsafe.AreSame` callsites #105000
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure that Windows is correctly saving SVE state as part of threadsuspend #105059
    area-PAL-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Use generic math for floating point formatting" for Single and Double #105038
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Added TypeSpec hierarchy to swift-bindings #2636

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishItemsOutputGroup target is missing some outputs published by ComputeFilesToPublish #42255
  • Support/generate shell completions for fig #42254
  • Improve the workload template experience #42253
  • .NET8 SDK error: GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8007000E #42252
  • NuGet Runtime pack for community-supported architectures #42248

Closed

  • dotnet add package stops checking sources on the first failure http code #42245

PullRequests

Created

  • Support AdditionalMSBuildParameters #42251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stable sort workloads list #42247
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Removed Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities #42241
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .gdnbaselines in VMR #42246
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement Channel Concept in dotnet test #42233
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Onboard Installer core-sdk-tasks tests to Helix #42243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Spike #42240

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: `params in` parameters #8301

PullRequests

Created

  • Add better conversion from collection expression to agenda #8304

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NuGet packages need to include a README.md #74466
    17.12
  • IDE0270 creates invalid code #74460
    Backlog
  • Nonsense identifier expected error depending on how you edit unrelated code #74456
  • $$ in source code causes test always to fail #74454
  • Auto-indent doesn't work in inline diff mode #74453

Closed

  • Outlining Failing for Sub with Optional Parameter #73640
  • Methods with Optional String Parameters Won't Collapse #73798
    17.11
  • Error message for invalid 'csharp_style_namespace_declarations' is unclear #71844
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35118.130 #74458
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35118.200 #74457
  • Source Generator generated code cannot be compiled #74388

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue with ForAttributeWithMetadataName being in an inconsistent state after a match. #74468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #74467
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add Razor EA to remote workspace #74465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen of `[]` for immutable arrays #74464
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Flesh out capturing of `this` into a closure in an instance extension member. #74463
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.Build.NoTargets instead of Microsoft.Build.Traversal #74461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flesh out delegate creation from instance extensions #74459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74455
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge internal release/dev17.11 back to release/dev17.11 #74446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable running in ARM64-native mode on .NET Framework. #74285
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more descriptive error message when editorconfig value is incorrect #74449
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic for 'value' as a contextual keyword #74408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore MSBuild_Logs folder #74462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup in VS generator UI code. #74448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add monthly smoke test to release branch official builds #74447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #74451
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support VS System theme #74432
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Instance extensions - flesh out code gen for iterator/async methods. #74437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Document state updating #74441
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
  • Do not load generators in VS process #74444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0] Bad template configuration #56904
  • Schemas for parameters should not specify `nullable: true` #56903
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56902
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56901
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, multiple_queries #56900
  • OpenAPI schema transformers not working correctly for types #56899
    9.0-preview7
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute with Blazor not working #56893
    9.0-rc1
  • `ElementReference` is sometimes null when performing interop in `OnAfterRenderAsync` #56892
  • `System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute.` from `AuthenticationStateProvider.NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged` #56891
  • Static SSR sets null to an array property of a model for EditForm when submit. #56890
    9.0-rc1

Closed

  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from Blazor Web templates #52769
    9.0-preview7
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProvider breaks after trimming #56207
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #56404
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #56882
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #56887
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #56888
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #56889
  • Properties for a class that extends Dictionary are not present in the JSON schema #56707
  • Trim unused code when publish will delete route controllers #56898
  • When using AddJwtBearer it can not read .well-known/openid-configuration if it contains an object #56852
  • PolicyEvaluator doesn't have correct logic #56656
  • HubException when using MessagePack in .NET 8 #56502
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.QueryStringValueProviderFactory.CreateValueProviderAsync #56722

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset OpenApiSchemaTransformerContext before each invocation #56905
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 #56895
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b4aaf97` to `9ff2450` #56894
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove downlevel runtimes from SiteExtensions package #56884
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Add ClaimData for AuthenticationStateData and fix overtrimming #56878
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview7
  • Support for Pushed Authorization (PAR) in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Add Job Attempt Number to Artifact Names for Logs and Test Results #56897
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet-trace collect` hangs without completing collection on Linux #3935
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Update GCInfo deserializer once https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/104336 merges #4795
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Screenshots taken using IScreenshot.CaptureAsync don't include popups or visible alerts #23731
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 4.1 has a severe memory leak on iOS #23728
  • [Windows][Bug] Shell shows as blank screen when returning from another page #23724
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible doesn't work for nested content #23720
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabs on Android are sometimes not visually removed from view when IsVisible is set to false. #23717
  • [MAUI] `File.Designer.cs` is not generated for `File.resx` placed in MAUI Library #23716
  • [Android] CarouselView + CollectionView performance issues #23715
  • XamlC XC0045 on Reference Bindings pointed to XAML #23711
  • [MAUI] I6_Grouping_VerticalItemSpacing :Grouped CollectionView have extra space #23708
    Backlog
  • Using Label's Style in ContentPage.Resources or not, it makes different appearance #23707
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout - The content of the long text items overlaps. #23705
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I3_Specific item sizing - The page layout after horizontal rotation should not be close. #23704
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-Vertical list and Grid content cannot adapt when the window is reduced #23702
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I6_Grouping_VerticalItemSpacing page When the window is reduced in size, the Small &Big &Awesome strings are displayed repeatedly. #23701
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer(Add Clear) - When added to items 4, the footer will disappear. #23700
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I9_Scrolling with no jitter-The Static and Dynamic Height pages cannot be scrolled. #23698
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer-The header and emptyview content are not displayed correctly #23697
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout - The layout of the Item is not in the same horizontal position when the 'UpdateColumns' button is clicked multiple times. #23696
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I3_Sizing_Specific item sizing for horizontal list When the window is reduced, the content is not fully displayed. #23695
    Backlog

Closed

  • HybridWebView configuration to enable F12/browser dev tools #23663
    9.0-preview7
  • "FileSystem" doesn't work on .net maui 9 preview blazor hybrid "Web App" project #23718
  • Workload 8.0.61 breaks Mono interpreter on MacCatalyst. #23577
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [Binding SG] BindingSourceGen generates invalid code when referencing fields generated by XamlG #23531
    .NET 9 Planning
  • When resizing the application window in Windows, if the resizing is done horizontally then elements within the window will resize correctly, but if resizing is done only vertically then resizing does not occur. #23641
  • Android compatibility tests broken on net.9 #23713
    9.0-preview7
  • Splash screen and Material Icons not showing correctly on Android Release build, real device. #22999
  • XamlC error XFC0045 with maui dotnet 9 preview 3 #22318
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI default project template Windows platform creation completed and running failed #23571
  • When starting a new activity that inherits from MauiAppCompatActivity throw a better exception #19233
    Backlog
  • Nunits/Xunits support only .net8.0 and cannot be written specifically for either .net8.0 android or ios #23568
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging #21741
  • Switching from .net7.0-android to .net8.0-android causes 'missing java symbols errors' in runtime inside a .net8.0-android MAUI app #21102
  • [MAUI] Height is not considered for ViewCell #23312
  • Maui MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync fails under iOS with no error message #23197
  • InvalidOperationException on MauiPage when runing in debug #23480
  • [iOS] Shapes in CollectionView will cause item height increase #23446
  • ArgumentException in Preferences.Get #23536
  • cannot disable animation when navigate back #23524
  • exception of type 'javax.crypto.aeadbadtag exception' was thrown when calling SecureStorage.Default.SetAsync on Android #22239
  • Android Crashes with "This window is already associated with an active Activity" when we use AppFlip #23645
  • The RealParent on XXX has been Garbage Collected #23691

PullRequests

Created

  • HybridWebView: Remove unneeded DefaultFile / HybridRoot handler properties #23730
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Account for safearea #23729
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView DisconnectHandler SelectionMode Crash #23726
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Stop using `IPlatformSizeService` #23725
  • [net9.0] Obsolete the old mechanism for registrations #23723
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • [ci] Add scheduled push to nightly feed job #23721
    area-infrastructure
  • [Binding SG] Clean up #23714
  • [net9.0] Delete obsolete Mappers #23712
  • Obsolete compatibility layout #23710
    area-layout

Merged

  • [windows] Fix Updating the initial position #23709
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when referencing results of other source generators #23646
  • Add the embedding sample #23647

Updated

  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Use UIView.Window instead of the global window #23693
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
  • [Windows] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #23526
    area-layout
  • [X] deprecate fontImageExtension #23657
    area-fonts
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
    area-infrastructure
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to insert records into tables consisting of only a primary key #34254
  • Expose indices, constraints names on model snapshot #34253
  • API throwing has exited with code 3221225477 (0xc0000005) 'Access violation' #34251
  • How can i easily configure the value comparison of the change-tracker to be value-equality instead of reference-equality? #34248

Closed

  • Cosmos: FeedIterator and ResponseMessage aren't properly disposed #34092
    9.0.0
  • Using static methods in compiled query issue #33395
  • System.InvalidCastException when using custom collection as navigation collection #34247
  • Mapping-aware cusom SQL #34245
  • Understanding EFCore's `IAsyncEnumerable` #33338
  • Manipulating Model (get/find/update/add) by string name #33289
  • Full-Text Search not working with Global Query Filter #33799
  • Enum to string conversion is not respected inside anonymous object in a set operation #33770
  • Using OrderBy on property that was resolved using double ternary operator. #33607

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: error on operator ordering that requires pushdown #34255
  • Get partition keys, container name, and JsonIdDefinition from the root entity in the hierarchy by default #34252
  • Generate suppressible error when entity saved to Cosmos without PK value set #34250
  • Enabled key converter tests for Cosmos #34249

Updated

  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
